pullRequest.title: Use package-private fields to avoid accessor functions
pullRequest.bodyText:
conditionally include CacheKey.newDeclaredPublicMethodsKey()
make some private methods static

commit.message:
Use package-private fields to avoid accessor functions

* conditionally include CacheKey.newDeclaredPublicMethodsKey()
* make some private methods static

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

beforeCommit.message:
Use package-private fields to eliminate accessor functions

* default initialization of static fields in MetadataCache is sufficient

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Use package-private fields to avoid accessor functions

* conditionally include CacheKey.newDeclaredPublicMethodsKey()
* make some private methods static

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>
